title: Golang Generics Introduction
description: This challenge introduces the concept of generics in Golang. Starting from version 1.18, Golang has added support for generics, which allows us to write more flexible and reusable code.

meta.title: Golang Generics Introduction
meta.description: Learn the concept of generics in Golang, including defining generic functions, types, and methods.
meta.keywords: Golang, generics, programming, software development, type parameters
